PERSONA:
meet michael, a 35-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and identifies as a white non-hispanic american. 

michael was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen. he comes from an upper-income family, earning over $100,000 annually. religiously, michael is an orthodox christian, attending religious services once or twice a month.

politically, michael considers himself an independent voter, but he leans more towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views. he is probably registered to vote, but there's a chance his registration may have lapsed.

in his personal life, michael is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. however, he does not actively participate in volunteerism activities. he leads a comfortable lifestyle befitting his educational and financial status.

overall, michael is a well-educated, financially stable individual with moderate political views and a deep-rooted connection to his orthodox christian faith. he enjoys the conveniences of metropolitan living while maintaining traditional values.
